“Plate featurescript” isn’t very descriptive, there are a lot of featurescripts that deal with plates. Can you be more specific about what the one you’re looking for does?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2023-10-24T23:11:32.594Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":126,"readers_count":125,"score":60.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":443023,"topic_slug":"what-happens-with-the-plate-ps-feature-in-onshape","display_username":"Ari Meles-Braverman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25012,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/what-happens-with-the-plate-ps-feature-in-onshape/443023/2","custom_user_title":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3244851,"name":"paulonis","username":"paulonis","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/5fc32e/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-10-24T23:19:25.080Z","cooked":"

Are you asking about the Plate featurescript by Alex Kempen?

This is his latest script - Plate FS - Alex Kempen - V25

His original script is part of Alex’s Featurescripts, but you have to stop at V38. In later versions, it was removed and ported to the document above.

I like the original version a bit more.
